attributes.action: Stop the High Speed Train Link from being built , and to refurbish the existing rail network for the benefit of everyone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to try and stop the building of the high speed rail link between London And Birmingham. This Link is unneccesary and would scar much of England's currently unspoilt countryside. It would also destroy medieval ridge and furrow land which has recently been protected. Homes will be destroyed, schools demolished and communities ripped apart.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
